sentence: The latest tally of analyst opinions from the major brokerage houses shows that among the 30 stocks making up the Dow Jones Industrial Average, Procter & Gamble ( PG ) is the #16 analyst pick.

Despite being ranked lower than the median among analyst picks of the Dow, Procter & Gamble Co. ranks better than the median among analyst picks for the broader S&P 500 index components, claiming the #233 spot out of 500.
Looking at the stock price movement year to date, Procter & Gamble ( PG ) is lower by about 1.0%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
